sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>true</before> <description>This script will run once on upgrade to mark customized RVA as "Replace On Upgrade"=true on their sys_update_xml records so that we: a. Avoid producing too many skipped records b. Will allow future updates to RVA records</description> <name>deCustomizeRVAsUpdatedByAudit</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[if (!pm.isZboot()) { gs.info('deCustomizeRVAsUpdatedByAudit - Start'); new SNC.ReportUtil().deCustomizeRVAsUpdatedByAudit(); gs.info('deCustomizeRVAsUpdatedByAudit - End'); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-01-30 15:25:53</sys_created_on> <sys_id>d779d05053b02110f2a1ddeeff7b12a0</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>deCustomizeRVAsUpdatedByAudit</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Reporting" source="com.glideapp.report">4433b8603c31311068bcf327dfe37f37</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_d779d05053b02110f2a1ddeeff7b12a0</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-02-13 21:29:58</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
